textos_fuente.text: Wine & Cigar Bar | DeLand, Florida Home Calendar Menu Become a VIP Contact Catering & Events Bronx Pizza Contact Us 555-555-5555 info@citywineandcigar.com 386-337-7008 Home Calendar Menu Become a VIP Contact Catering & Events Bronx Pizza Check our calendar for daily specials and live entertainment! City Wine & Cigar is your cozy spot for great food, premium wines, cigars, and live entertainment—perfect for relaxing with friends, whether inside or on the patio. Located in the Victoria Commons Complex Our story Welcome to City Wine & Cigar—your go-to spot for great food, drinks, and entertainment! Whether you're joining us at the bar, dining room, or relaxing on our patio, we offer an impressive selection of wines and craft cocktails. Explore our humidor to find a variety of cigars to suit every taste and budget. We’ve partnered with Bronx Pizza to offer a full menu, featuring everything from appetizers and small plates to charcuterie boards, entrees, and desserts. Perfect for lunch, dinner, or just a quick snack or drink! Don’t forget to check our social media for live entertainment on the patio most evenings. There’s always something happening at City Wine & Cigar—come be part of the fun! Hours of Operation Monday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm Tue - Thu 11:00 am - 9:30 pm Fri - Sat 11:00 am - 11:00 pm Sunday 11:00 am - 9:00 pm 111 Victoria Commons Blvd. Suite 113 DeLand, FL 32724 ﻿ Contact Us 386-337-7008 info@citywineandcigar.com Share by:

City and Wine Cigar Opens in DeLand | 103.3 The Vibe Skip to Content ON AIR NOW 3:00 PM - 7:00 PM Jay Michaels Menu More ▼ ▲ Sign In On Air ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Personalities DJ Tremble Alyssa Jay Michaels Tino Cochino Slow Jams Podcasts Contests ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Contest Rules Official Rules for Southern Stone Communication’s Universal Orlando Resort Halloween Horror Nights Promotion ’25 Events News ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Contact About WVYB Home On Air ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Personalities DJ Tremble Alyssa Jay Michaels Tino Cochino Slow Jams Podcasts Contests ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Contest Rules Official Rules for Southern Stone Communication’s Universal Orlando Resort Halloween Horror Nights Promotion ’25 Events News ▼ ▲ sub menu toggle Contact About WVYB Sign In Search City and Wine Cigar Opens in DeLand Nov 15, 2023 | 4:14 PM DELAND, Fla. – One of the great tests of any friendship is to venture into business together. That’s what five friends in DeLand decided to do this month with City Wine & Cigar, the newest restaurant to open in the heart of Volusia County. The business’ owners are Elvira Hanna, Melissa Stalzer, Jessica Ferrentino, Paula Outzen, and Paul Hunt, a group of friends with a passion for food service. Two are veterans – Stalzer with the U.S. Air Force Reserves and Hunt in the Royal Navy. City Wine & Cigar held its soft opening back in October, unveiling their food and drink menu to the public and receiving a warm initial welcome. They’re now preparing for a formal ribbon-cutting next month, December 5th at 5:30 pm. The restaurant is located at 111 Victoria Commons Blvd, Suite 113 in DeLand, where The Grapevine used to be. The restaurant currently offers salads, charcuteries, sandwiches, and soups, as well as a selection of wines and cigars as the name suggests. It regularly hosts live entertainment, both music and comedy, and advertises itself as dog-friendly. “We’re excited about infusing new energy and ideas into the business,” co-owner and DeLand native Elvira Hanna said. “Recognizing the desire for a community-centric atmosphere, we’re committed to adding our unique touch, ensuring that both locals and visitors relish the City Wine & Cigar experience for the foreseeable future.” City Wine & Cigar is open seven days a week, from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm Mondays through Thursdays, 11:00 am to 12:00 am on Friday and Saturday, and 1:00 pm to 8:00 pm on Sunday. They can be reached by email at info@citywineandcigar.com, and on Facebook or Instagram. About City Wine & Cigar | DeLand, Florida Home Calendar Menu Become a VIP Contact Catering & Events Bronx Pizza Contact Us 555-555-5555 info@citywineandcigar.com 386-337-7008 Home Calendar Menu Become a VIP Contact Catering & Events Bronx Pizza Let us host your next event! Let us host your next event at City Wine & Cigar! Whether it’s a bridal shower, birthday party, retirement celebration, rehearsal dinner, or reunion, our venue provides a welcoming and relaxed atmosphere—without any facility fee. With live music on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday nights, your event will be even more special. Catering food items are also available for pickup with 24 hours’ notice. Call or text our event planner, Constance, at (386) 785-3271 to start planning your event today! Place your catering order by calling (386) 785-3271 . 111 Victoria Commons Blvd. Suite 113 DeLand, FL 32724 ﻿ Contact Us 386-337-7008 info@citywineandcigar.com Share by:

cguarria@hometownnewsmediagroup.com Sep 21, 2023 Sep 21, 2023 Updated Sep 27, 2023 0 Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Chris Barfield, who is handling public relations for City Wine & Cigar, said the owners hope to become a fixture for the Victoria Park community in DeLand. Photo by Charles Guarria Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save A new wine bar in DeLand will open in an established wine bar location. City Wine & Cigar is readying for its Oct. 1 soft opening at 111 Victoria Commons Blvd., the former home of Grapevine Wine Bar. Chris Barfield is handling public relations for City Wine & Cigar. While sitting at the bar, he explained how the owners were customers of Grapevine Wine Bar. They enjoyed the vibe and would discuss what they would do if they had a chance to run it. When the chance happened, they bought in as it was “the perfect opportunity to help liven this area up,” Mr. Barfield said. They want to re-inject the Victoria Park community with a family-friendly establishment. In addition to wine and cigars, they will offer craft beer, cappuccino, coffee, espresso and tea. The food menu is “predominately appetizers,” Mr. Barfield said. Charcuterie boards will be the food focal point. They will also serve small plates highlighted by crab cakes. There will be a Sunday brunch offering a mimosa charcuterie board. And, of course, there are cigars. At first blush, cigars and wine might seem a bit non-traditional, as many think in terms of cigars and cognac, bourbon or a darker rum. However, white wines go well with lighter, sweeter cigars and cigarstud.com mentioned port wine as “a good partner for a premium cigar.” They suggest vintage Port because it has the “sweetness and alcohol to complement a full-bodied smoke,” and younger Ports will “lend spice to your cigar.” Mr. Barfield said, “There's actually a huge group of cigar smokers that enjoy quality fine wines with a cigar and beers.” Cigar smoking will be outside on the patio, he said. “It's not going to be a cigar lounge. This is a wine bar that offers cigars for outdoor smoking or to go.” There will be a walk-in humidor. The owners plan on having about 40 different cigar brands once fully stocked. Orlando-based Oxford Cigar Co. will provide some of the smokes and a sommelier to advise City Wine & Cigar on pairing “wines from our menu with cigars,” Mr. Barfield said. As far as selecting the wines, they have been talking to and tasting the wine of about five distributors with the goal of “having a nice plethora, variety of everything,” Mr. Barfield noted. There will be a handful of local wines, with most of the wine being “Italian, French quality, California, Napa, Sonoma wines,” he said. Summing up what they're offering, he said, “We just want to put out a great product.” The inside décor will feature a lounge area and a loveseat. There is a designated area at the bar to select a beverage to take to the patio, or you can order outside as there will be patio wait service. “The inside will be more like a living room atmosphere,” Mr. Barfield said. City Wine and Bar encourages patrons to grab food from the next-door pizzeria and sit on their porch with a glass of wine. Touching on the family-friendly aspect, Mr. Barfield said, “If their kids want to grab ice cream and sit outside while we have live music, with mom and dad having a glass of wine, no problem. Bring whatever (food) you'd like. It's gonna be a nice community spot that they can come to.” The live music will be acoustic, jazz-type music. They might also have a comedy night. Core Five Volusia LLC is the name of the ownership group. They are “five locals,” who are “very involved in the community,” Mr. Barfield said. The partnership is a combination of folks who have been in the food and beverage business for many years and others who are new to the industry. They all live locally; some used to live in the Victoria Park community, and at least one owns another bar in DeLand. They have “a passion for wine,” Mr. Barfield noted. City Wine will be active in community events, such as the Halloween celebration. Victoria Park is a mixed-use development consisting of homes, offices, dining establishments and plenty of nature to complement biking and walking paths. The community is west of exit 116 on Interstate 4, about 15 minutes from Downtown DeLand. Mr. Barfield said, “We just felt like this was an opportunity to elevate this area, bring people back in here and stop them from driving all the way downtown.” City Wine will be open seven days a week. Newman Salesperson of the year Email: rzunt@jcnewman.com In Loving Memory of Our Friend Stefan Bastiaenssens In Loving Memory of Our Friend Stefan Bastiaenssens Territory: All Territories outside the US; mainly Europe Year Started with the Company: 2018 Favorite JCN Cigar: Black Diamond Hobbies/Interests: Cigars, wine, beer, music fitness. Favorite Thing About the Cigar Industry: The bond that is created between two people that smoke. You can enter a cigar room or lounge without knowing anyone and leave it having made many new friends! Favorite Place to Travel: All countries in the Carribean Favorite Newman Memory: I love all members of the family, but Bobby was the first one I met. He picked me up at the airport when I flew over applying for the job and the first thing he said was: “I am Bobby, and this is Jeanny”. Next thing I know I am showing pictures of me and my family. Couldn’t think of a warmer welcome. Favorite Quote: “Happiness is about a good meal, a good cigar, and a good woman, or a bad woman, depending on how much happiness you can handle” Fun Fact: Stefan ran a cigar magazine for a number of years before joining the J.C. Newman Team. Privacy Policy Creekside Cigar Co respects your privacy. If you sign up for any of our engagement and outreach programs, including those that use SMS text messaging, we ONLY use information you provide to transmit your mobile messages and, upon request, respond to you directly. This includes sharing information with our program partners, message content providers, phone companies, and vendors who assist us in the delivery of mobile messages. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, WE DO NOT SELL, RENT, LOAN, TRADE, LEASE OR OTHERWISE TRANSFER FOR PROFIT ANY PHONE NUMBERS OR CUSTOMER INFORMATION COLLECTED THROUGH PROGRAMS TO ANY THIRD PARTY. We do reserve the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request, to avoid liability, or to protect our rights or property. When you complete forms online or otherwise provide us information at point of sale, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and true information. Founders | Founders Cigar Company | Veteran Owned Cigars + Accessories Skip to content Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting $ 0.00 0 Cart Premium Cigars from a Veteran Owned, Top-Rated Cigar Brand Discover Our Small-Batch Blends from a Veteran-Owned Premium Cigar Brand Crafted for Character: Premium Cigar Blends You Can Buy Online or at your Favorite Cigar Shop Our cigars are from the Dominican Republic, rolled with care, and ready for you to enjoy with your friends and family. Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Premium Cigars Paired with Cigar Education + Community At Founders Cigar Company, we’re here to equip both seasoned cigar enthusiasts and those new to the cigar world with premium cigars from a top cigar brand you can trust. Whether you’re looking to buy cigars online for a special occasion or to enjoy your everyday ritual, our collection delivers bold flavor, consistent craftsmanship, and a legacy of excellence. We’re also passionate about education— our blog is packed with helpful guides on how to cut a cigar , light a cigar , and navigate cigar culture and etiquette with confidence. From first light to final draw, Founders is your go-to veteran-owned cigar brand for quality, knowledge, and community. Gift a Custom Cigar Box At Founders Cigar Company, we’ve created the ultimate custom cigar box—a premium gift that’s as personal as it is unforgettable. Whether you’re shopping for corporate gifting, groomsmen gifts, bachelor parties, or Father’s Day, our cigar box is designed to leave a lasting impression. Each handcrafted box includes 16 premium cigars from a top cigar brand, along with a high-quality cutter and lighter—everything they need to enjoy a perfect smoke. What makes it truly special? You can customize the lid with your logo, name, date, or personal message, turning it into a keepsake that’s both stylish and meaningful. Whether you’re celebrating milestones or building client relationships, Founders’ custom cigar box delivers quality, character, and craftsmanship in every detail. Order yours today. Ask Your Local Cigar Shop for Founders Cigars​ We love when cigar enthusiasts shop local—there’s nothing like enjoying a premium cigar from your favorite hometown lounge or retailer. If your local cigar shop doesn’t carry Founders Cigars yet, ask them to! As a veteran-owned premium cigar brand, we’re proud to be featured in cigar shops across the country, and we’d be honored to be on the shelves of your favorite spot. Whether you’re looking to buy cigars locally or help introduce a top cigar brand to your community, your support helps us grow and share our passion for premium cigars with more enthusiasts like you. Find A Retailer Near You! We Believe In Supporting Veterans + Local Communities At Founders, We Support Our Veterans Cigars Donated 0 Cigars Donated 0 About Founders Cigar Company Founders began with a small group of friends who started meeting weekly for bonfires and cigars in the early days of the 2020 pandemic. At a time when the rest of the world was shut down, cigars served as a surprising catalyst for connection. Today, we’re here to provide you with premium cigars and the cigar education you’re looking for. City and Wine Cigar Opens in DeLand | 93.1 Coast Country Menu Listen Live On-Air Personalities Events Contests Contest Rules Official Rules for Southern Stone Communication’s Universal Orlando Resort HHN Promotion ’25 News Contact × Sign In Search Home On-Air Personalities Events Contests Contest Rules Official Rules for Southern Stone Communication’s Universal Orlando Resort HHN Promotion ’25 News Contact City and Wine Cigar Opens in DeLand By News Daytona Beach - Latest Stories Nov 15, 2023 | 4:14 PM DELAND, Fla. – One of the great tests of any friendship is to venture into business together. That’s what five friends in DeLand decided to do this month with City Wine & Cigar, the newest restaurant to open in the heart of Volusia County. The business’ owners are Elvira Hanna, Melissa Stalzer, Jessica Ferrentino, Paula Outzen, and Paul Hunt, a group of friends with a passion for food service. Two are veterans – Stalzer with the U.S. Air Force Reserves and Hunt in the Royal Navy. City Wine & Cigar held its soft opening back in October, unveiling their food and drink menu to the public and receiving a warm initial welcome. They’re now preparing for a formal ribbon-cutting next month, December 5th at 5:30 pm. The restaurant is located at 111 Victoria Commons Blvd, Suite 113 in DeLand, where The Grapevine used to be. The restaurant currently offers salads, charcuteries, sandwiches, and soups, as well as a selection of wines and cigars as the name suggests. It regularly hosts live entertainment, both music and comedy, and advertises itself as dog-friendly. “We’re excited about infusing new energy and ideas into the business,” co-owner and DeLand native Elvira Hanna said. “Recognizing the desire for a community-centric atmosphere, we’re committed to adding our unique touch, ensuring that both locals and visitors relish the City Wine & Cigar experience for the foreseeable future.” City Wine & Cigar is open seven days a week, from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm Mondays through Thursdays, 11:00 am to 12:00 am on Friday and Saturday, and 1:00 pm to 8:00 pm on Sunday. They can be reached by email at info@citywineandcigar.com, and on Facebook or Instagram. Weather Daytona Beach, FL, USA 82 °F Partly cloudy Recently Played More Advertise With Us! City Wine & Cigar Posted Wednesday, November 15, 2023 4:14 pm Chris Gollon DELAND, Fla. - One of the great tests of any friendship is to venture into business together. That's what five friends in DeLand decided to do this month with City Wine & Cigar, the newest restaurant to open in the heart of Volusia County. The business' owners are Elvira Hanna, Melissa Stalzer, Jessica Ferrentino, Paula Outzen, and Paul Hunt, a group of friends with a passion for food service. Two are veterans - Stalzer with the U.S. Air Force Reserves and Hunt in the Royal Navy. City Wine & Cigar held its soft opening back in October, unveiling their food and drink menu to the public and receiving a warm initial welcome. They're now preparing for a formal ribbon-cutting next month, December 5th at 5:30 pm. The restaurant is located at 111 Victoria Commons Blvd, Suite 113 in DeLand, where The Grapevine used to be. The restaurant currently offers salads, charcuteries, sandwiches, and soups, as well as a selection of wines and cigars as the name suggests. It regularly hosts live entertainment, both music and comedy, and advertises itself as dog-friendly. "We're excited about infusing new energy and ideas into the business," co-owner and DeLand native Elvira Hanna said. "Recognizing the desire for a community-centric atmosphere, we're committed to adding our unique touch, ensuring that both locals and visitors relish the City Wine & Cigar experience for the foreseeable future." City Wine & Cigar is open seven days a week, from 11:00 am to 10:00 pm Mondays through Thursdays, 11:00 am to 12:00 am on Friday and Saturday, and 1:00 pm to 8:00 pm on Sunday. They can be reached by email at info@citywineandcigar.com, and on Facebook or Instagram .
